content: I think it's a combination of being able to multitask and the convenience of being able to listen on-the-go. I can just put in my earbuds and zone out during my commute, which makes the time pass so much faster. Plus, I've discovered some really engaging hosts and topics that keep me hooked. Speaking of which, I've been really inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit of "How I Built This" and the productivity tips on "The Tim Ferriss Show".
